name: Starline (Titosh, Firtn, Nebrazif)
description:
Defend your starship from incoming enemy waves in Starline! This game emulates the Vectrex experience and uses its unique Light Pen. Draw walls to survive in this exciting retro shooter that will bring you back to the roots of gaming.

How to play :

  • Use the joystick on your controller to rotate the auto-shooting spaceship.
  •  Draw lines with your pen/mouse to shield your ship from incoming enemies.
